meanings: (귀금속의 무게) don (≒3.75 gram), Korean unit of weight used for precious metals

meanings.meaning: someone would sell their own grandmother

vlive.korean: [돈 벌기 힘들쥬?] [It's hard to make a living, isn't it?] View video 모비딕(Mobidic) : V라인을 위해 연예인들이 즐겨 마시는 해독주스 레시피 <99초 리뷰> 88회 : 해독주스 편
vlive.english: [It's hard to make a living, isn't it?]

vlive.korean: 돈 벌기가 참 쉽지 않은 것 같아요 - 펜이 필요할 것 같아요 - 잘생겼다! It's not easy to sell products. - I think we need a pen. - Handsome! 듣기 View video 방판소년단-SBS Plus : [방판소년단 EP47] '크나큰 & B.P.S' 핫도그 건대대첩?!
vlive.english: It's not easy to sell products. - I think we need a pen. - Handsome!

vlive.korean: 나무네요 님이 '돈 벌기 참 힘들 것 같다.'래요. "It seems hard to earn money". 듣기 View video IDOL x IDOL : A-DAILY - 에이데일리 '진실 혹은 거짓'
그걸 보고 참 돈 벌기 힘들구나... I thought that it's not easy making money... 듣기 View video INFINITE : 이번생일이 젤루행복해연 으해햏 감사의 마음~.~
vlive.english: I thought that it's not easy making money...

vlive.korean: 그런 게 힘들어. - 남의 돈 벌기 힘들어. That is hard. - It's hard to earn money. 듣기 View video LOVELYZ : '러블리즈 다이어리 시즌5' 8화 ('Lovelyz Diary Season 5' EP.8)
vlive.english: That is hard. - It's hard to earn money.

examples.korean: It's too late to cash in on that particular clothing fad. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그런 종류의 옷은 유행에 맞춰 돈 벌기는 너무 늦었어. YBM All in All English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: It's too late to cash in on that particular clothing fad. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: These jobs can allow for promotions, and students would quickly begin to make money instead of going into debt from college. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 이런 직업들은 승진을 감안하고, 학생들은 대학진학으로 빚에 지는 것 대신 빠르게 돈 벌기를 시작할 수 있다. TIMES CORE
examples.english: These jobs can allow for promotions, and students would quickly begin to make money instead of going into debt from college. Add to Wordbook
